bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of BCGM 風瘡 feng chuang , wind sores, affecting the legs of adult women. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry tou gou 頭垢 quotes Jian bian dan fang 簡便單方 : 婦人足瘡經年不愈，名裙風瘡。用男子 頭垢，桐油調作隔紙膏，貼之 , “If adult women suffer from sores on their feet that do not heal over the years, this is called ‘ skirt-wind sores’ . Take the filth from the head of a male, mix with tong oil and apply as a plaster on paper”.
